description: Situated near the centre, this restaurant occupies a small group of eight carefully restoredtrulliwhich provide an elegant and charming setting, with just 20 seats arranged throughout its small buildings. Traditional, regional cuisine reinterpreted with a skilful modern twist.
creditCards: Amex, Unionpay, Dinersclub, Discover, Jcb, Maestrocard, Mastercard, Visa
